column4: anyway, dual head is a way to use a second monitor and extend your desktop to it
so what you'd want to do is use your hdtv as a second monitor, and use that guide to set it up
there's also a guide, if you google "ubuntu dual monitor" on the ubuntu support forums is another thread that may also help
no, it's not a package. It's a setup, and requires you (usually) to edit your xorg.conf file to set up
